isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - MAINSHAFT AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLIES

step1.para: Move the reverse gear to the rear as far as possible, meshing teeth of the gear with those of the reverse idler gears ( Figure 259).

figure.caption: Figure 259. Move Reverse Gear to Rear

step1.para: Align the external splines of the spacer with clutching teeth of the reverse gear and move the spacer forward on the mainshaft and into reverse gear ( Figure 260).

figure.caption: Figure 260. Move Spacer Forward on Mainshaft

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the hub of the reverse gear and move the reverse gear forward on the mainshaft and into the proper position in the case ( Figure 261).

figure.caption: Figure 261. Install Snap Ring in Hub of Reverse Gear

step1.para: Install the snap ring on the mainshaft snap ring groove ( Figure 262).

figure.caption: Figure 262. Install Snap Ring on Mainshaft Snap Ring Groove

step1.para: Install the splined washer on the mainshaft splines behind the reverse gear ( Figure 263).

figure.caption: Figure 263. Install Splined Washer on Mainshaft Splines

step1.para: Install the auxiliary drive gear assembly on the rear of the mainshaft ( Figure 264). Use a flanged-end driver and maul to seat the bearing in the case bore.

figure.caption: Figure 264. Install Auxiliary Drive Gear Assembly on Rear of Mainshaft

step1.para: Align the six bolt holes in the retainer with the tapped holes in the case and install the bolts ( Figure 265). Tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N· m) and lockwire the bolts in groups of three.

figure.caption: Figure 265. Align Bolt Holes in Retainer With Case and Install Bolts

step1.para: Install the splined washer on the mainshaft splines behind the auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 266).

figure.caption: Figure 266. Install Splined Washer on Mainshaft Splines

step1.para: Install the snap ring in groove at the end of the mainshaft ( Figure 267).

figure.caption: Figure 267. Install Snap Ring in Groove at End of Mainshaft
